comment_body:
... an unusual fascination anime and grow neck beards. 
Now that's horror. 

Good job ramping up the suspense towards the end as the reader is suddenly aware that they are just about to get him. That's not easy to do.
Haha! There's all sorts of ways I had this transmission worked into a larger story line... that wasn't one of them... hahaha!
Thank you! Glad you enjoyed it!
Thank you! I’m glad you enjoyed it! I hadn’t considered “the unusual...” could be applied to interests and behaviors! That opens up a lot more possibilities! Thanks!
